author: Intelligencer Staff
title: The NYC Council Speaker on ‘Frightening’ Weeks Ahead and What the City Needs Now
description: “I don’t think New Yorkers are psychologically prepared for what’s about to happen,” Corey Johnson tells Kara Swisher.
content: As the City Council Speaker, Corey Johnson has been one of the loudest voices pushing for a substantial coronavirus stimulus for residents of New York. With the citys economy in tatters as it becomes the global epicenter of COVID-19 cases, Johnson has pushed … [+12274 chars]
